title: Prepare Simple W-2 Return
description: A single individual with one W-2 and no dependents needs their federal tax return prepared.

tasks.description: Input the taxpayer's personal information and the data from their Form W-2.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly enters all information from the W-2 into the tax software.

tasks.description: Determine if the taxpayer should take the standard deduction or itemize.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly determines the standard deduction is higher.

tasks.description: Finalize the return and show the taxpayer their calculated refund amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a complete and accurate return showing the final refund.
